author: jorton
msg: shmcb_cyclic_cton_memcpy): Fix potential shmcb segfault for small
Reviewed by: Madhusudan Mathihalli, Joe Orton, Jeff Trawick

author: geoff
msg: reset @SkipReasons when exiting.  otherwise, @SkipReasons will bleed into
the next call, which goes unnoticed most of the time but is readily apparent
if two tests that call under_construction() are next to eachother
